short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly access any mode of ChatGPT Plus: GPT-4+Plugins, GPT-4+Code Interpreter, GPT-4 Default, or GPT-3.5 Default-No more detours!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*********** HOW TO USE ChatGPT PLUS MODE MAESTRO 
** You MUST have a chatGPT Plus account for this plugin to work. 

FIRSTLY, choose the desired mode by clicking one of the buttons: "GPT-4 + Plugins", "GPT-4 + Code Interpreter", "GPT-4 Default", or "GPT-3.5 Default". This will open a new tab directly to a fresh chatGPT chat, using the selected model, with Plugins activated if applicable. No more hover-click detours!

SECONDLY, this plugin resizes the "Plugins Dropdown menu" in "GPT-4 with Plugins" to display all the Plugins you have installed for GPT-4. 

SYNOPSIS:  While using the chatGPT Plus's GPT-4 (Plugins Mode) model, the Plugins Dropdown menu only displays 4 Plugins at a time. If you have dozens of plugins installed, this extension lengthens your ChatGPT Plus 'Plugins Dropdown menu' to display all of your installed plugins. 

 *************************. *************************. *************************
